title: The Future of Keyboards: Laser, Virtual, and Neural Interfaces
description: Will we still use physical keyboards in 10 years? Exploring the cutting edge of text input technology.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Projection Keyboards

Cool sci-fi factor, but terrible tactile feedback. Unlikely to replace physical keys.

Voice Dictation

Getting better every year, but lacks privacy and precision for code/editing.

Direct Neural Interface

The holy grail. Thinking the words and having them appear. Still in early research phases.
